name: OCP
policy: Report a Security Vulnerability Hope changes lives. We at Pfizer are in relentless pursuit of scientific breakthroughs and revolutionary medicines that will create a healthier world for everyone. Pfizer takes cybersecurity seriously and value the contributions of the security community at large. The responsible disclosure of potential issues helps us ensure the security and privacy of our customers and data. Vulnerability Disclosure PolicyPfizer has partnered with HackerOne to handle reports of potential security or vulnerability issues in our products or services. Please note that this policy does not provide any form of defense or indemnity for any actions, nor does it authorize or encourage any actions that are either in breach of the law or of this policy.
